titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31980R3472 English
Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3472/80 of 30 December 1980 supplementing the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 determining intervention centres for olive oil, as a result of Greek accession

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3472/80 of 30 December 1980 supplementing the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 determining intervention centres for olive oil, as a result of Greek accession
body.p: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3472/80 of 30 December 1980 supplementing the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 determining intervention centres for olive oil, as a result of Greek accession
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Economic Community,
Having regard to the Act of Accession of Greece (1), and in particular Article 146 thereof,

Whereas Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 (2) determines the intervention centres for olive oil in the producer Member States ; whereas the said list of centres should be supplemented to take account of Greek accession,
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 is hereby supplemented by the list of Greek intervention centres given in the Annex to this Regulation.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1981.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
